## Installing package

maptools is retried and binary is removed from CRAN.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("maptools",repos = "https://packagemanager.posit.co/cran/2023-10-13")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

The downloaded binary packages are in
	/var/folders/sl/008pmy7n24b0g1bkdpky5q900000gn/T//Rtmp63Uc6r/downloaded_packages
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse,tmap,sf)
```
:::


### Importing Geospatial Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcare_sf <- st_read("data/child-care-services-geojson.geojson")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `child-care-services-geojson' from data source 
  `/Users/liangyuhang/Downloads/Maaaaaaaaaark/IS415_g/In-class_Ex/In-class_Ex03/data/child-care-services-geojson.geojson' 
  using driver `GeoJSON'
Simple feature collection with 1545 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6824 ymin: 1.248403 xmax: 103.9897 ymax: 1.462134
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `/Users/liangyuhang/Downloads/Maaaaaaaaaark/IS415_g/In-class_Ex/In-class_Ex03/data' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::


### Data warning


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
childcare_sf <- st_transform(childcare_sf, crs = 3414)
mpsz_sf <- st_transform(mpsz_sf, crs = 3414)
```
:::


### Working with St_union()

st_union is used to derive the coast outline sf tibble data.frame


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sg_sf <- mpsz_sf %>%
  st_union()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(sg_sf)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex03_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### take_home exe

acled_sf \<- read_csv("")%\>% st_as_sf(coords =c("longitude", "latitude"),crs=4326)%\>% st_transform(crs=32647) %\>% mutate(event_data =dmy(event_data))

tmap_mode("view") acled_sf %\>% filter(year = 2023 \| event_typr ="Poticial violence") %\>% tm_shape(), tm_dots() tmap_mode("plot")
